Package Model

Class CardDeck

java.lang.Object
Model.CardDeck
public class CardDeck extends Object
This class is a deck of cards (basically and ArrayList of Card classes) and methods are included to get the top card, to add a card at the bottom of the deck, shuffle the deck, ect.
Version:
1.0
Author:
csd4623

    Constructor: Constructs a new CardDeck and sets the type of the card deck.
    CardDeck​(DeckType type)
    Constructor: Constructs a new CardDeck and sets the type of the card deck.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addCardToBottom​(Card card)
    Transformer: adds a Card as the first element
    Precondition: The deck has not reached maxCapacity
    Postcondirion: The card is added as the first element of the deck
    int
    getDeckSize()
    Observer: returns the current size of the deck
    Postcondition: the size is returned
    Card
    getTopCard()
    Transformer: removes the last element and returns it
    Precondition: The deck is not empty
    Postcondirion: The card is removed from the deck and is returned
    void
    shuffleDeck()
    Transformer: Shuffles the deck
    Precondition: The deck is not empty
    Postcondirion: The order of the cards in the array list is random

  • Constructor Details

    • CardDeck

      public CardDeck​(DeckType type)
      Constructor: Constructs a new CardDeck and sets the type of the card deck. If type is MESSAGE sets maxCapacity to 48, else if type is DEAL sets maxCapacity to 20
      Postcondition: The object has been constructed and initialized
      Parameters:
      type - either DEAL or MESSAGE

    • CardDeck

      public CardDeck​(ArrayList<Card> deck, DeckType type)
      Constructor: Constructs a new CardDeck and sets the type of the card deck. If type is MESSAGE sets maxCapacity to 48, else if type is DEAL sets maxCapacity to 20. Also, the elements of the parameter deck are copied to the ArrayList of the class
      Precondition: The parameter deck.size<=maxCapacity
      Postcondition: The object has been constructed and initialized
      Parameters:
      deck - that will be copied to the class' ArrayList
      type - either DEAL or MESSAGE

  • Method Details

    • getTopCard

      public Card getTopCard()
      Transformer: removes the last element and returns it
      Precondition: The deck is not empty
      Postcondirion: The card is removed from the deck and is returned
      Returns:
      Top Card

    • addCardToBottom

      public void addCardToBottom​(Card card)
      Transformer: adds a Card as the first element
      Precondition: The deck has not reached maxCapacity
      Postcondirion: The card is added as the first element of the deck
      Parameters:
      card - that will be added to the deck

    • getDeckSize

      public int getDeckSize()
      Observer: returns the current size of the deck
      Postcondition: the size is returned
      Returns:
      size of deck

    • shuffleDeck

      public void shuffleDeck()
      Transformer: Shuffles the deck
      Precondition: The deck is not empty
      Postcondirion: The order of the cards in the array list is random
